title: A Christmas Gift
description: A Young Adult Romantic ComedyHolly and Caleb had been best friends as children, growing up on the same street, but as teenagers they couldn't be further apart. When Caleb unexpectedly asked Holly to help him pick out a Christmas gift for his girlfriend, neither of them anticipated where it would lead...A Christmas Gift is a sweet romance, suitable for ALL ages."Oh what it is to be young and in love! A funny, light and frothy read." Janie Oakes, Teen Reader Today.
author: Stella Wilkinson
